title: Rogers to Replace CEO Joe Natale After Board Fight
sub_head: Former finance chief Tony Staffieri will take over on interim basis
body:
TORONTOâ€”Rogers Communications Inc. said Chief Executive Joe Natale had left and was being replaced on an interim basis by former finance chief Tony Staffieri.
The company said it has begun searching for a permanent CEO and that Mr. Staffieri, who was fired in September, is a candidate. News of the management change was earlier reported by the Toronto Star.
